content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I am glad you are interested in my apartment. I am sure you will find it to be in perfect condition. Now, let's talk about the rental price. How much are you willing to pay?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student so I don't have a lot of money to spend. I was thinking of starting at 500 Euro per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That is too low for my liking. I am the owner of this apartment and I want to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate a bit more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 550 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's still too low. I am the owner of this apartment and I want to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate a bit more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I understand. How about 600 Euro per month?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
